com.parkingwang.hichart.listener

接口 OnChartValueSelectedListener


  • public interface OnChartValueSelectedListener
    The chart value selected listener.
    从以下版本开始:
    2017-06-13 0.1
    作者:
    黄浩杭 (huanghaohang@parkingwang.com)

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void onValueSelected(LineChartView chartView, int lineIndex, int pointIndex, PointValue point) 
      void onValueUnselected() 

    • 方法详细资料

      • onValueSelected

        void onValueSelected(LineChartView chartView,
                     int lineIndex,
                     int pointIndex,
                     PointValue point)
        参数:
        chartView - The line chart view
        lineIndex - The index of the line that contains the selected point.
        pointIndex - The index of the point in line.
        point - The selected point.

        void onValueUnselected()
